featuredArticle.title: Russia-Ukraine Peace Talks: Major Breakthrough as Both Sides Agree to Ceasefire Framework
featuredArticle.excerpt: In a historic development, negotiators from Russia and Ukraine have agreed on a preliminary ceasefire framework after marathon talks in Istanbul. The agreement, mediated by Turkey and the UN, outlines a phased withdrawal and humanitarian corridors.
